solution_line_template: She has {total_minutes} minutes to do work because {hours_available} times {minutes_per_hour} equals <<{hours_available}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes}

She has already spent {total_homework_minutes} minutes on homework because {math_minutes} plus {english_minutes} plus {science_minutes} plus {history_minutes} equals <<{math_minutes}+{english_minutes}+{science_minutes}+{history_minutes}={total_homework_minutes}>>{total_homework_minutes}
She has {minutes_left} minutes to finish her project because {total_minutes} minus {total_homework_minutes} equals <<{total_minutes}-{total_homework_minutes}={minutes_left}>>{minutes_left}.
